document.full_text: japanese big manufacturers expect conditions to worsen significantly in the next three months, responses to a bank of japan survey collected after the march 11 earthquake showed on monday. it was a reversal of the full survey results.
document.title: japan business mood to worsen after quake
lines_and_colors: japanese big manufacturers expect conditions to worsen significantly in the next three months, responses to a bank of japan survey collected after the march 11 earthquake showed on monday. it was a reversal of the full survey results.
